## Source: ossf-package-analysis (048f93df54854431a2f36a8645a1966e5dca77f5effa1f5c9c20c21df6956423)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pyjwtrequest' @ 1.0.4 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
